zbx.title: Zero Quartile
zbx.shortDesc: It's a way to cost management with the help of data visualization(charts) and helps to take right actions to reduce the expense by implementing policy changes, driving lower pricing through procurement, making appropriate changes to consumption etc. Zero quartile, will not only help you to move along the cost curve but enables you to completely redefine the cost curve.

iot.title: Asset Insight (IOT)
iot.shortDesc: Tracks and manages all of the asset with this asset management application. Tells where the asset is located and helps to create geo-fence around the assets and monitor it. With the help of detailed report (charts) on various components like Battery Voltage, Battery Pressure, Engine Temperature etc helps you to take suitable actions if required.

amp.title: AMP
amp.shortDesc: KOGENTIX Automated Machine Learning Platform (AMP) powers the design, experimentation, development and deployment enterprise-scale AI applications.

supplyChain.title: Supply Chain Management
supplyChain.shortDesc: Tool that allows you to manage all components and finished goods part numnbers.

assetHealthMonitor.title: Asset Health Monitor
assetHealthMonitor.shortDesc: Developed an analytical product for the 'Internet of Things' infrastructure which aids the end user ensure the system will not run out of energy.

solarOperationsWatch.title: Solar Operations Watch
solarOperationsWatch.shortDesc: Solar Operations Watch an application built for the clien-Leading Lighting and Energy solutions provider. Developed an analytical product for the Internet of Things infrastructure which aids the end user ensure thatthe system will not run out of energy
